sentences.sContent: Yesterday is history and tomorrow is merely a figment of your imagination.
sentences.sContent_eng: Yesterday is history and tomorrow is merely a figment of your imagination.
sentences.sCn: 昨天已经成为历史，而明天仅仅只存在于你的想象虚构。

remMethod.val: fig(做) + ment → 做出来的 → 虚构的事

trans.tranOther: something that you imagine is real, but does not exist
